00012 {
00013         name = gensym(cName);

00025 DataspaceLib::DataspaceLib(char *cName, char *cNativeUnit)
00026         : inUnit(NULL), outUnit(NULL)
00027 {
00028         unitHash = hashtab_new(0);
00029         name = gensym(cName);
00030         neutralUnit = gensym(cNativeUnit);
00031 }
00032 
00033 
00034 DataspaceLib::~DataspaceLib()
00035 {
00036         t_symbol                **keys = NULL;
00037         long                    numKeys = 0;
00038         long                    i;
00039         DataspaceUnit   *unit;
00040 
00041         hashtab_getkeys(unitHash, &numKeys, &keys);
00042         for(i=0; i<numKeys; i++){
00043                 hashtab_lookup(unitHash, keys[i], (t_object**)&unit);
00044                 delete unit;
00045         }
00046         hashtab_chuck(unitHash);
00047 }
00048 
00049 
00050 // remember, we are relying on memory passed in for the outputAtoms             
00051 JamomaError DataspaceLib::convert(long inputNumArgs, t_atom *inputAtoms, long *outputNumArgs, t_atom **outputAtoms)
00052 {
00053         double  value[3];       // right now we only handle a maximum of 3 values in the neutral unit passing
00054         long    numvalues;
00055         
00056         if(inUnit->name == outUnit->name){
00057                 *outputNumArgs = inputNumArgs;
00058                 sysmem_copyptr(inputAtoms, *outputAtoms, sizeof(t_atom) * inputNumArgs);
00059         }
00060         else{
00061                 inUnit->convertToNeutral(inputNumArgs, inputAtoms, &numvalues, value);
00062                 outUnit->convertFromNeutral(numvalues, value, outputNumArgs, outputAtoms);
00063         }
00064         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00065 }
00066 
00067                 
00068 JamomaError DataspaceLib::setInputUnit(t_symbol *inUnitName)
00069 {
00070         if(inUnit && inUnitName == inUnit->name)        // already have this one loaded
00071                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00072         else
00073                 return (JamomaError)hashtab_lookup(unitHash, inUnitName, (t_object**)&inUnit);
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 JamomaError DataspaceLib::setOutputUnit(t_symbol *outUnitName)
00078 {
00079         if(outUnit && outUnitName == outUnit->name)     // already have this one loaded
00080                 return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00081         else
00082                 return (JamomaError)hashtab_lookup(unitHash, outUnitName, (t_object**)&outUnit);
00083 }
00084 
00085 
00086 void DataspaceLib::registerUnit(void *unit, t_symbol *unitName)
00087 {
00088         hashtab_store(unitHash, unitName, (t_object*)unit);
00089 }

00091 
00092 void DataspaceLib::getAvailableUnits(long *numUnits, t_symbol ***unitNames)
00093 {
00094         hashtab_getkeys(unitHash, numUnits, unitNames);
00095 }

00100 /***************************************************************************
00101         Interface for Instantiating any DataspaceLib
00102  ***************************************************************************/
00103 #include "AngleDataspace.h"
00104 #include "ColorDataspace.h"
00105 #include "DistanceDataspace.h"
00106 #include "GainDataspace.h"
00107 #include "NoneDataspace.h"
00108 #include "PitchDataspace.h"
00109 #include "PositionDataspace.h" 
00110 #include "TemperatureDataspace.h"
00111 #include "TimeDataspace.h"
00112 
00113 
00114 JamomaError jamoma_getDataspace(t_symbol *dataspaceName, DataspaceLib **dataspace)
00115 {       
00116         if(*dataspace){
00117                 if(dataspaceName == (*dataspace)->name)
00118                         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE; // already have this one, do nothing...
00119                 else{
00120                         delete *dataspace;
00121                         *dataspace = NULL;
00122                 }
00123         }
00124 
00125         // These should be alphabetized
00126         if(dataspaceName == gensym("angle"))
00127                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new AngleDataspace;
00128         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("color"))
00129                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new ColorDataspace;
00130         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("distance"))
00131                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new DistanceDataspace;
00132         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("gain"))
00133                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new GainDataspace;
00134         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("none"))
00135                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new NoneDataspace;
00136         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("pitch"))
00137                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new PitchDataspace;
00138         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("position")) 
00139                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new PositionDataspace;
00140         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("temperature"))
00141                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new TemperatureDataspace;
00142         else if(dataspaceName == gensym("time"))
00143                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new TimeDataspace;
00144         else 
00145                 // Invalid -- default to temperature
00146                 *dataspace = (DataspaceLib*) new TemperatureDataspace;
00147         
00148         return JAMOMA_ERR_NONE;
00149 }
00150 
00151 
00152 // This function allocates memory -- caller must free it!
00153 void jamoma_getDataspaceList(long *numDataspaces, t_symbol ***dataspaceNames)
00154 {
00155         *numDataspaces = 9; // must be the length of the Dataspace
00156         *dataspaceNames = (t_symbol**)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_symbol*) * *numDataspaces);
00157         
00158         // These should be alphabetized
00159         if(*numDataspaces){
00160                 *(*dataspaceNames+0) = gensym("angle");
00161                 *(*dataspaceNames+1) = gensym("color");
00162                 *(*dataspaceNames+2) = gensym("distance");
00163                 *(*dataspaceNames+3) = gensym("gain");
00164                 *(*dataspaceNames+4) = gensym("none");
00165                 *(*dataspaceNames+5) = gensym("pitch");
00166                 *(*dataspaceNames+6) = gensym("position"); 
00167                 *(*dataspaceNames+7) = gensym("temperature");
00168                 *(*dataspaceNames+8) = gensym("time");
00169         }
00170 }
